Plot: In 1937, a teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar" directed by a young Orson Welles.
Title: Me and Orson Welles
Writer: Robert Kaplow (based on the novel by), Holly Gent Palmo (screenplay), Vincent Palmo Jr. (screenplay)
Actors: Christian McKay, Zac Efron, Zoe Kazan, Megan Maczko
tomatoConsensus: Me and Orson Welles boasts a breakout performance by Christian McKay and an infectious love of the backstage drama that overcomes its sometimes fluffy tone.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 5 wins & 25 nominations.
